action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A black and white photo of an older man with a beard sitting on a bench on a sidewalk. He is holding onto a stroller. Next to him is a large sign that reads, "The Lord Jesus Christ will return. Please read Revelation clue Psalm 1:7 21:27 97." There are other people walking in the background, including a child in a striped dress.

DESCRIPTION: A maroon and yellow train engine with the number 7220 displayed prominently on the side. The train is on a track, and there is some graffiti visible in the background. The engine has a gray roof and various mechanical components visible underneath.

QUESTION: Is there any text or numbers visible on the train in your image?
